description: BACKBONE Tools Registry - Discoverable tools for AI assistants

tools.name: Add Research Conviction
tools.description: Add a high-conviction ticker based on research. Boosts the ticker's score for 2 weeks.

examples.reason: Strong AI chip demand, datacenter growth
Government contracts expanding, AI platform adoption

tools.name: Get Research Convictions
tools.description: List all active research convictions with their effective boosts

tools.name: Analyze Ticker
tools.description: Get comprehensive analysis of a ticker including score breakdown, technicals, and conviction status

tools.name: Research Stock
tools.description: Deep research a stock using web search, news, and financial data. Returns structured findings.

tools.name: Generate Morning Brief
tools.description: Generate and optionally deliver the morning brief

tools.name: Portfolio Summary
tools.description: Get current portfolio status including positions, P&L, and signals

tools.name: Health Check
tools.description: Get latest health data from Oura (sleep, readiness, activity)

tools.name: Goal Progress
tools.description: Get progress on active goals

tools.name: World Pulse
tools.description: Get real-time snapshot of markets, news, and world events. The AI's eyes on what's happening.

focus.description: Focus area: markets, news, or all

tools.name: Market Monitor
tools.description: Monitor markets for significant events and generate alerts. Detects large SPY moves, extreme signals, position impacts.

tools.name: Fetch News
tools.description: Fetch latest news from financial and world sources. Updates the news cache for other tools.

category.description: News category: markets, business, tech, all

tools.name: Send Alert
tools.description: Send a proactive message to the user via WhatsApp. Use when discovering something important.

type.description: Alert type: alert, trade, market, news, health, goal, breakthrough

tools.name: Prediction Research
tools.description: Manage the automated ticker prediction research system. Runs at 8 PM daily, evaluates half the universe every 2 days.

action.description: Action: status, run, research, get, clear

tools.name: Markdown to LaTeX/PDF
tools.description: Convert markdown files to LaTeX (.tex), then compile to PDF. Supports headings, lists, tables, code blocks, checkboxes, links.

action.description: Action: convert (MD→LaTeX), compile (LaTeX→PDF), full (MD→LaTeX→PDF), check (verify toolchain)

input.description: Path to .md or .tex file (relative to projects/ or absolute)

output.description: Output path for .tex file (optional, defaults to same dir)

title.description: Document title (auto-detected from first H1 if omitted)

tools.name: Produce Deliverables
tools.description: Generate tangible deliverables (Excel, PDF, PowerPoint, Word) for all projects. Reads real project data and produces professional documents.

project.description: Specific project to produce for (optional, defaults to all)

tools.name: List Deliverables
tools.description: Show all project deliverables status — what's produced, what's pending, with file paths.

tools.name: Video Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze YouTube videos — extract transcript, key frames, and AI-powered visual analysis. Downloads video, extracts frames at intervals, transcribes audio, and uses Claude/OpenAI vision to describe each frame.

intervalSeconds.description: Extract a frame every N seconds

keepFiles.description: Save frames and analysis to data/video-analysis/

framesOnly.description: Skip transcript, only extract and analyze frames

transcriptOnly.description: Skip video download, only fetch transcript and metadata

tools.name: Open URL
tools.description: Open a URL in the user's default browser. No API keys needed. Use this for simple 'open X' requests — just launches the browser and navigates.

tools.name: Browse Website
tools.description: Open any website using the user's real Chrome browser with saved cookies and passwords. NO API keys needed. The user is already logged in to Gmail, Outlook, banks, etc. Just opens the page and returns the text content. Use this for 'go to X' or 'check my email' requests.

wait.description: Wait time in ms for page to load

tools.name: Browser Agent
tools.description: AI-driven browser agent that navigates any website, reads content, clicks buttons, fills forms, and extracts information. Uses the user's real Chrome profile (all logins preserved). Requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY for the AI planning. For simple 'just open a page' tasks, use the 'browse' tool instead.

url.description: Starting URL (optional — AI can figure it out)

goal.description: What to accomplish (e.g., 'read my top 3 emails')

examples.goal: go to gmail and read my top 3 unread emails
get the current S&P 500 price and top market movers

tools.name: Browser Capture
tools.description: Open a real Chrome browser, navigate to a URL, capture screenshot, page text, links, API responses, and full HTML. Saves everything to data/captures/.

wait.description: Wait time in ms for dynamic content

tools.name: TradingView Chart Analyzer
tools.description: Visual chart analysis — screenshots TradingView charts, scrapes financials/technicals, uses AI vision to assess patterns and adjust convictions

tools.name: Enrich LinkedIn Profile
tools.description: Enrich any user's LinkedIn profile from public web sources. Two-phase: plan (get search queries) then enrich (save results).

tools.name: Generate Evening Brief
tools.description: Generate evening recap: accomplishments, portfolio P&L, health, tomorrow's calendar

tools.name: Net Worth Snapshot
tools.description: Get net worth breakdown from Empower (cash, investment, credit, loan)

tools.name: Recession Check
tools.description: Get current recession probability score (0-10) with component breakdown

tools.name: Create Goal
tools.description: Create a new trackable goal with category and optional tasks

category.description: Category: health, finance, career, learning, personal, social

tools.name: Set Reminder
tools.description: Schedule a WhatsApp reminder for a future time (absolute or relative)

when.description: When to send: ISO datetime, or relative (30m, 2h, 1d, tomorrow 9am)

tools.name: News Digest
tools.description: Get latest news headlines from cache with optional category filter

tools.name: Backup Now
tools.description: Trigger Firebase Storage backup of all user data (projects, memory, goals, spreadsheets)

tools.name: Contact Lookup
tools.description: Search contacts by name, company, or role

tools.name: Life Scores
tools.description: Get life dimension scores (health, wealth, career, relationships, etc.)

tools.name: Web Research
tools.description: Generate a structured research plan with search queries for any topic

tools.name: Computer Use
tools.description: Full desktop control — launch apps, click, type, scroll, take screenshots. Uses vision to see the screen and decide actions. Give it a goal like 'open Word and type hello' and it handles everything: launching the app, dismissing dialogs, clicking, typing.

goal.description: What to accomplish (e.g., 'open Word and type I love working on software')

examples.goal: open Notepad and type Hello World
open Word and write a letter to my mom
take a screenshot of the desktop
